Cherry Blossom Blooming Status Color Palette

Source: R/supplemental.R
bbgcolors.Rd

Color palette used on the official Brooklyn Botanic Gardens website tracker.

Usage

bbgcolors(name)

Source

https://www.bbg.org/collections/cherries

Arguments

name

string for what color information to gather

Details

Values can be any of the following: "all", "bloom0", "pre", "prebloom", "bloom1", "first", "first_bloom", "bloom2", "peak", "peak_bloom", "bloom3", "post", "postpeak_bloom".

Examples

bbgcolors("all")
